document_data.name: Palladium
document_data.mainbody: '''Palladium''' was an elemental material found in the [[Realms]].
document_data.Availability: In {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}, the [[Elemental Store]] of [[Karsus Enclave]] sold pure elemental bricks of palladium for 10 [[gp]] per {{SI|1|ounce|long=yes}}.
document_data.Usages: * Palladium was used in the creation of [[holy symbol]]s.
